Verify the main image viewer dialog has z index 1000 and overflow 'hidden'
Verify the previous/next navigation arrows have fill 'white' and opacity 0.7
Verify the photo timestamp shows 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'

Verify the transaction table header 'Date' has font weight 700 and font size 14px

Verify the date picker element has a value '2023-10-26'
Verify the filter dropdown has aria-label 'Filter transactions'
Verify the 'View Details' link has an offset position relative to its parent
Verify the transaction ID uses a monospace font family

Verify the game title 'Block Buster Puzzle' has font size 40px and text color #00bcd4
Verify the game description paragraph has line height 1.5 and word spacing 0.05em
Verify the 'Play Now' button is visible, enabled, has background #ff5722, and border radius 10px
Verify the game screenshot 'game_screenshot.jpg' is loaded, has rendered dimensions 640x480px, and alt text 'Gameplay screenshot'
Verify the rating display shows '4.5 stars'
Verify the game container uses 'display: block' and has a min-height of 600px
Verify the fullscreen toggle changes the player's 'fullscreen' state
Verify the game trailer video is muted by default and has a clip path 'circle(50% at 50% 50%)'

Verify the radio button labels have font weight 400 and text color #555555

Verify the question counter displays 'Question 3 of 5'
Verify the progress bar element has a width of 60%
Verify the input fields for comments have a placeholder 'Your feedback here'
Verify the 'Previous' button is visible and clickable
Verify the survey form has a column gap of 0 and row gap of 20px
